Credits Menu replaces Mode Team Test debug menu
This replaces the entries in the debug menu for "Mode Team Test" with the credits of SD Remix.
0x803FC4CC is the RAM location of this menu
[_glook]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
<strCreditsLink> ALL
68747470 3a2f2f73 6472656d 69782e67 616d6573 2f61626f 75740000

NTSC 1.02 ---- 0x3F94CC -----
00000000 00000000 803FC420 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
00000001 803007C8 803FC42C 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
->
00000000 00000000
    .long <<strCreditsLink>>
    00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
# END OF LIST
    00000009 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
# Extra to end of menu
# 00000001 803007FC 803FC440 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
# 00000001 80300830 803FC454 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
# 00000001 80300864 803FC468 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
# 00000001 80300898 803FC47C 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
# 00000001 803008CC 803FC490 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
# 00000001 80300900 803FC4A4 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
# 00000001 80300934 803FC4B8 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
# 00000009 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
